Univariate Gaussian Distribution is Normalized

Premmi


Date: May 14, 2016

To prove that the univariate Gaussian distribution is normalized, we will first show that it is normalized for a zero-mean Gaussian and extend that result to show that 1#1(x2#23#3, 4#45#5) is normalized.

The pdf of the zero-mean Gaussian distribution is given by:

6#6 (1)

To prove that the above expression is normalized, we have to show that
